text:
When stopping the testplan, which uses jdbc, jmeter does not totally stop and 
Jmeter has to be closed and started again. Exception:
Maybe because HashMap is not static variable ?


Exception:

java.util.ConcurrentModificationException
      at java.util.HashMap$HashIterator.nextEntry(Unknown Source)
      at java.util.HashMap$KeyIterator.next(Unknown Source)
      at org.apache.jmeter.protocol.jdbc.util.DBConnectionManager.shutdown
(connectionManager.java:157)
      at org.apache.jmeter.prototocl.jdbc.sampler.JDBCSampler.testEnded
(JDBCSampler.java:303)
      at org.apache.jmeter.engine.StandardJMeterEngine.notifyTestListenersOfEnd
(StandardJMeterEngine.java:165)
      at org.apache.jmeter.engine.StandardJMeterEngine$StopTest.run
(StandardJMeterEngine.java:220)
      at java.lang.Thread.run(Unknown Source)
creator: r.vanderboom@kpn-is.nl

text: JDBC no longer uses its own connection manager.
creator: sebb@apache.org
wrowe@apache.org
text: *** Bug 41335 has been marked as a duplicate of this bug. ***
